item.description:
Normally this class is filled with Business Executives, teachers, HR reps or employees of the state. This time it is open to you! Don't kid yourself, we all have stress and of many types. The easiest way to deal with it is to identify it, quanitify it, reduce it and reevaluate it.

Don't miss a chance to save yourself lots of stress, learn new cool stuff, meet new people and last but not least have all thais and it won't cost you!

 

join us tonight for:

Barb Tremlett, MBA, JP and Reiki Master Teacher will speak about stress in our lives and how to neutralize it. She will cover techniques to identify stress and how to release it from our bodies. Attend the program and get a free chair massage. Friday, April 6th 6-7pm

 

See you there!

 

NO charge!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Stress Mangement- Ways to relax in less than 5 minutes.
